III. INVESTIGATION
Rule Code & R 400.4158 Intervention standards and prohibitions.
Section (1) A child caring institution shall establish and follow written
Description policies and procedures that prohibit the following forms of
intervention: (a) Any type of physical punishment including, but not
limited to:
(ii) Hitting or striking, throwing, kicking, pulling, or pushing a youth
on any part of their body
1

Violation Potential Rule or Statute Violation
Type
Allegation Youth A was choked during a restraint by Staff 1.
Investigation Interviews:
Complainant was interviewed face-to-face on 3/6/25 along with
MDHHS Specialist. Complainant did not provide any additional
information.
Youth A reported Staff 1 choked her while restraining her and this
occurred in either 2023 or 2024. Youth A reported Staff 1
threatened to kill her. Youth A did not recall who else was present
and denied telling anyone about the incident at the time.
Youth B was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on 03/12/25.
Youth B reported she never witnessed Youth A being restrained
by Staff 1. Youth B denied ever witnessing Staff 1 or any other
staff choke Youth A. Youth B denied knowledge of Youth A being
injured or in pain after a restraint.
Youth C was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on 03/12/25.
Youth C reported she did not have any issues with Staff 1 but he
could have an attitude sometimes. Youth C reported she was not
aware and did not witness Staff 1 restrain Youth A. Youth C
reported she did not witness any staff choke Youth A. Youth C
denied witnessing or having knowledge of any staff improperly
restraining Youth A or harming her during a restraint.
Youth D was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on 03/12/25.
Youth D reported she has witnessed Youth A in a restraint a
couple of times. Youth D reported she never witnessed Staff 1 or
any other staff choke Youth A.
Supervisor was interviewed via video conference on 3/21/25.
Supervisor reported Youth A was restrained multiple times during
her stay at the facility. Supervisor said she never witnessed or
heard about any staff including Staff 1 choking Youth A during a
restraint or threatening to kill her.
Staff 1 was interviewed via phone on 3/21/25. Staff 1 reported he
had been involved in restraints with Youth A during his
employment with the facility. Staff 1 denied ever choking Youth A.
Staff 1 denied knowledge of Youth A being injured or complaining
of pain during or following a restraint.
Staff 4 was interviewed via video conference on 3/21/25. Staff 4
reported she was aware Youth A was restrained frequently for
physically aggressive behavior while at the facility. Staff 4 denied
2

witnessing Staff 1 or Supervisor improperly restraining Youth A
including choking. Staff 4 denied knowledge of Youth A ever being
injured or reporting pain during or following a restraint.
Staff 2 was interviewed via video conference on 4/2/25. Staff 2
denied witnessing or knowledge of Staff 1 choking Youth A or any
other youth.
Documentation Reviewed:
• Incident reports #1499, #1534, #1878, #2572 were
reviewed regarding incidents with Youth A in which she
was restrained by Supervisor and/or Staff 1. No injuries or
concerns were documented.
• Incident Report (IR) dated 10/14/24 documents only
incident in which Staff 1 was involved in a restraint with
Youth A. There are no indications of possible choking or
threatening language. IR also notes that police came to the
scene to assist in calming Youth A.
• Human Resources Notes regarding Staff 1. Per email
authored by Human Resources Representative Staff 1 had
0 disciplinary actions on file.
• Human Resources Notes regarding Supervisor. Per email
authored by Human Resources Representative Supervisor
has 4 disciplinary actions on file regarding attendance.
Analysis There is no violation found regarding this allegation. Staff,
Supervisor, and Youth interviews denied witnessing Youth A being
choked during a restraint with Staff 1 or any other staff. Incident
reports of restraints with Youth A and identified staff were
reviewed and no concerns related to possibly choking were
identified.
Conclusion Violation Not Established
Rule Code & CCI Rule 400.4158 Intervention standards and prohibitions.
Section (1) A child caring institution shall establish and follow written
Description policies and procedures that prohibit the following forms of
intervention:
(a) Any type of physical punishment including, but not limited to:
(iii) Threats of restraint, seclusion, punishment, or otherwise
suggesting physical or emotional harm to a youth.
Violation Additional Allegation
Type
Allegation Staff 1 threatened to kill Youth A and Staff 2 threatened to beat
her ass.
3

Investigation Interviews:
Complainant was interviewed face-to-face on 3/6/25 along with
MDHHS Specialist. As indicated above, Complainant did not
provide any additional information.
Youth A reported Staff 1 threatened to kill her. Youth A reported
she did not recall who else was present and denied telling anyone
about the incident at the time.
Youth B was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on 03/12/25.
Youth B denied knowledge or witnessing any staff threaten to
harm her or kill Youth A. Youth B denied witnessing or knowledge
of any staff improperly restraining Youth A.
Youth C was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on 03/12/25.
Youth C denied knowledge of staff threatening Youth A in any way
including to kill her.
Youth D was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on 03/12/25.
Youth D reported she never witnessed Staff 1 or any other staff
threaten Youth A in any way including to kill her.
Supervisor was interviewed via video conference on 3/21/25.
Supervisor denied hearing Staff 2 or any staff threaten to beat
Youth A’s, Youth D’s or any other Youth’s ass.
Staff 1 was interviewed via phone on 3/21/25. Staff 1 denied
knowledge of Staff 2 threatening to beat any youth’s ass including
Youth A and Youth B.
Staff 4 was interviewed via video conference on 3/21/25. Staff 4
denied witnessing or knowledge of Staff 1 or Staff 2 threatening to
kill them or to beat their ass.
Staff 2 was interviewed via video conference on 4/2/25. Staff 2
denied threatening Youth A or Youth B and denied saying that she
would beat any youth’s ass at any time. Staff 2 denied threatening
to kill Youth A or any other youth.
Documentation Reviewed:
• Human Resources Notes regarding Staff 2. Per email
authored by Human Resources Representative Staff 2 has
zero disciplinary notes on file.
Analysis Allegation 1:
There were no rule violations found regarding this allegation. All
staff and youth witness interviews denied knowledge or witnessing
Staff 1 or Staff 2 threaten Youth A.
4

Conclusion Violation Not Established

Based on investigative findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable
